title: Gatherer
content:
Gatherer is a type of profession which can be used to collect various natural resources from within Hopeforest, used as part of recipes for Chefs, in creating potions by Alchemists and weapons and shields by Bonewrights.

As Gathering can take the player character into higher level zones with dangerous creatures that will attack, it is recommended to level the Scout profession in tandem with Gatherer in order to be able to venture past dangerous areas to acquire these valuable resources.

{| class="wikitable sortable" !Level !Unlocks !Experience !First-time EXP bonus !Buy for !Sell for !Uses !Location (# of nodes) !Gathering method !Respawn time (seconds) !Storage
